SUITE.NAME: All tests in project: project Coverage Results

option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: Added pages to create campaigns and to show all the campaigns. Also did some work on the database, although it's not yet normalised, I applied some common sense to split some tables up so that the data is less redundant.

Added pages to create campaigns and to show all the campaigns. Also did some work on the database, although it's not yet normalised, I applied some common sense to split some tables up so that the data is less redundant.

Added pages to create campaigns and to show all the campaigns. Also did some work on the database, although it's not yet normalised, I applied some common sense to split some tables up so that the data is less redundant.
Added simple settings page. User will then be able to change his/her details.
Added simple settings page. User will then be able to change his/her details.

Added direct messages page, as well as starting the ordering of campaigns requested by the user - this is not yet finished but shouldn't be hard to fix. I'll finish it off when I find a solution to a problem I'm encountering.

Improve the aesthetics of the website by adding icons and some other stuff. Each page has an unique title now, in addition, I started working on the deletions of campaigns (not finished but shouldn't take more than a couple of hours to finish it).

Improve the aesthetics of the website by adding icons and some other stuff. Each page has an unique title now, in addition, I started working on the deletions of campaigns (not finished but shouldn't take more than a couple of hours to finish it).
Started refractoring code and rewriting stuff to make it more readable and more efficient. More importantly, slitting the controller up into multiple files to make code more cohesive.
Second refractoring commit. Now main control has been split into multiple files.
Finished the "saving history" criteria - searches are saved into the database if user chooses to. Also added the tweet box (not functional yet) - work done by Andreea and Becca.
Finished the "saving history" criteria - searches are saved into the database if user chooses to. Also added the tweet box (not functional yet) - work done by Andreea and Becca.
Added "View Search history" page where user can see the earches he has saved.
Added "View Search history" page where user can see the earches he has saved.
Now each search in the "search history" page is a link that performs the same search.

MESSAGE.value: Added pages to create campaigns and to show all the campaigns. Also did some work on the database, although it's not yet normalised, I applied some common sense to split some tables up so that the data is less redundant.
Added simple settings page. User will then be able to change his/her details.

Added direct messages page, as well as starting the ordering of campaigns requested by the user - this is not yet finished but shouldn't be hard to fix. I'll finish it off when I find a solution to a problem I'm encountering.

Improve the aesthetics of the website by adding icons and some other stuff. Each page has an unique title now, in addition, I started working on the deletions of campaigns (not finished but shouldn't take more than a couple of hours to finish it).
Started refractoring code and rewriting stuff to make it more readable and more efficient. More importantly, slitting the controller up into multiple files to make code more cohesive.
Second refractoring commit. Now main control has been split into multiple files.
Finished the "saving history" criteria - searches are saved into the database if user chooses to. Also added the tweet box (not functional yet) - work done by Andreea and Becca.
Added "View Search history" page where user can see the earches he has saved.
Now each search in the "search history" page is a link that performs the same search.
